Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Establishes a rate of commission for licensed lottery sales agents
Summary: Establishes a rate of commission for licensed lottery sales agents; authorizes such agents to deduct the compensation rate from the face value otherwise payable by the agent to the New York state gaming commission.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a rate of commission for licensed lottery sales agents; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
